title: minecraft 玩不到～Failed to launch
author: yanyankaikai:)
txt_content:
進遊戲後，按了force update，然後便出現這個，怎麼辦？好想玩呢


Failed to launch
Fatel error occured (4):Address family not supported by protocol family: connect

replies.author: Mei灬不是
replies.txt_content: 你没force update完毕就关了minecraft客户端吧？重新force update一次

replies.author: strawmaine
replies.txt_content:
Mei灬不是 发表于 2012-7-3 13:21 
你没force update完毕就关了minecraft客户端吧？重新force update一次
头像是土豆么。。。好有型～

replies.author: Mei灬不是
replies.txt_content:
strawmaine 发表于 2012-7-3 03:04 
头像是土豆么。。。好有型～
{:10_524:}这么有型的头像。。居然就成土豆了。
